# identifier

**Article**

A string value that identifies the app-specific notification.

## Overview

The runtime provides this identifier to send the notification to the app. Set a custom value for this property for each unique notification your asset uses.

### Declaration

```other
uniform string identifier
```

## Properties

- **info:id**: The action’s unique identifier.
- **affectedObjects**: A list of prims that respond to the notification.

items.description: A list of prims that respond to the notification.
items.name: affectedObjects
